name: 4x4 Russian SUV: Offroad Race
description:
What can be crazier than russian cars? Only russian suv! Enjoy driving extreme off-road races in 4x4 Russian SUV: Offroad Race!

HOW TO PLAY: Use gas pedal and brakes on the screen to control your car. Your goal is to get through impassability and to reach a point of destination.

4x4 Russian SUV: Offroad Race game features:
• Extreme driving simulator 3D;
• Offroad challenge - only bad roads;
• Only russian retro auto - vaz, niva etc;
• Exciting atmosphere of Russia.

Are you ready to become a new legend of off-road racing? Bounce off an engine and drive fast in 4x4 Russian SUV: Offroad Race!
